Package gofoo

Class Structure

java.lang.Object
gofoo.Structure
public class Structure
extends java.lang.Object
A class structure is acting as a data base which stores the list of all added: playground owners, players, playgrounds with the specific owner of each playground, all the requests made by a player and a list for playgrounds that haven't been approved by administrator yet.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.ArrayList<PlaygroundOwner> owners  
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Player> players  
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Playground> playgrounds  
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Playground> resultPlaygrounds  
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Playground> waitingPlaygrounds  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Structure()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayer​(Player player)
    A function responsible for adding a new player after he registers with his personal information to the array list of players.
    void addPlayground​(Playground playground)
    A function that adds a new playground to the array list of playgrounds after it has been accepted by the admin.
    void addPlaygroundOwner​(PlaygroundOwner owner)
    A function that adds a new playground owner to the array list of owners after he chooses to register with his personal info.
    void addWaiting​(Playground ground)
    This function is responsible for adding a playground to the array list of waitingPlaygrounds when a playground owner chooses to add a playground but it has not been approved by the admin yet.
    void searchAndDisplayPlaygrounds​(int hours, int startTime)
    A function that displays all the playgrounds with their price that are available in the time the player chooses when he wants to request a playground.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public void searchAndDisplayPlaygrounds​(int hours, int startTime)
